roleset.name: blend, mix

role.descr: attribute of arg1 that is actually undergoing integration

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: A single unified body with sufficient rank is necessary to integrate these functions with coastal and shoreline law enforcement and fishing harbor inspections .
example.arg: with coastal and shoreline law enforcement and fishing harbor inspections

example.name: figure and ground merged
example.text: Mr. Spielvogel said Mr. Achenbaum will work with clients to determine the mix of promotion, merchandising, publicity and other marketing outlets, and to integrate those services.

example.name: all things integrated together in arg1
example.text: the integration of 'body, mind, and spirit'

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Taiwanese people in the mainland invariably wish to maintain their ties with Taiwan , and are particularly anxious to ensure that their children can integrate quickly into the school system back home once they return .
example.arg: into the school system back home

roleset.note: INTEGRATE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls amalgamate-22.2-1, amalgamate-22.2-2 (from integrate.01-v)
INTEGRATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to integrate.01. VN classes amalgamate-22.2-1 and amalgamate-22.2-2. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from integration.01-n)
